title: The Restaurant at the End of the Universe
description:
IN THE BEGINNING THE UNIVERSE WAS CREATED... THIS MADE A LOT OF PEOPLE ANGRY AND HAS BEEN WIDELY REGARDED AS A BAD MOVEYou decide. Come along on a zany journey to the low-rent neighborhood of the Cosmos with earthling Arthur Dent, sexy space cadet Trillian, that imperturbable alien Ford Prefect and Zaphod Beebelbrox, the two-headed, three-armed ex-head Honcho of All Creation. Don't forget to bring a towel, but don't bother to pack a lunch. You'll be dining at... 
THE RESTAURANT AT THE END OF THE UNIVERSE
author: Douglas Adams
